comment: If you go to class and complete the few homework problems, then you should not have difficulty with the class. He teaches the material well and is available for further assistance. Class is usually let out early too! Professor Garner tells funny jokes from time to time. Great professor!
This class was fairly easy if you just did what he told you to do. Do the homework, show up to class on time, study, and do the MML. He's available if you need help too.

This class was very hard for me. He isn't very clear in his lectures and PowerPoints. Do My Math Lab before it's due online. Do the homework. Four tests, quizzes (some attendance). If you miss more than 5 classes, grade drops. Requires a lot of self teaching.

This teacher was a pretty good teacher and really easy as long as you do the work. There are hw assignments for each class online at the text book site but you can always get a 100 on all of them because he lets you do it as many times as you want until you get a 100. His tests come straight from the notes and homework so they are very easy.

This professor is the kind of professor a college student dreams of. While his class is hard work he is very willing to help you succeed if you're willing to work for it. I care very much for this professor and recommend him to anyone who will listen. Met with me at 6am two times per week and I am forever grateful for his help.

Professor Garner is probably my favorite teacher. The subject he taught was difficult for me, but he helped me in every way possible (including before his 8am class). I would recommend him to anyone, and even though the subject was difficult for me he helped me understand what I needed to know in order to succeed. I LOVE YOU PROFESSOR GARNER!

I took him over the summer and I enjoyed the class. He has a great personality. Very funny and kept me interested. He almost ALWAYS let us out of class really early. He gives lots of extra credit, lots of random "quizzes" (sometimes just writing your name on the paper and turning it in!) I thought he was very good at explaining highly recommend him

I would probably take someone else if I could.. It is a very easy class if you do the hw. He gives easy hw quizzes A LOT!! He had some heath problems during the semester and wasnt able to teach some day through the semester.

If you have a better a choice...go for it. I mean, he's ok...he gives these dumb quizzes, they can be about the hwk or the notes or he has these ones where he make you write ur name for being on time..other than that the tests are mostly homework and he's very cool about answering questions after class,giv lots of book work but not mandatory

I took him for Statistic in the Fall. I'm horrible at math but he made it okay. I'm making an A right now. He gives A BUNCH of extra credit opportunities. Also, attendance is mandatory. He gives pop quizzes on the homework, so do it! Test questions are sometimes from the homework. Nice guy. Would take him again.

I took him in the summer and HATED it. He is very rude and when you go to ask him a question about math, he makes you feel like you're a complete idiot for asking. You have to attend class or he will drop you a letter grade after missing 2. The only upside is homework questions are copied/pasted onto the test. Other than that, its not worth it.

If you come to class everyday, take notes, and do the few homework problems, then the class is an easy A. All the test questions are exactly the same as the homework problems. There is a stats project you have to do on Excel, but he is willing to help and it ended up being easy.

if you are a math whiz, then you'll be fine with him.  if you need any help at all -- do not take him.  he moves very fast and barely addresses questions... normally he just tries to make you feel dumb.  definitely acts as if almost everyone in the class is incapable of ever fully grasping the true concept of math.

STAY AWAY!!!!!!!!!!!!! I mean he  is a great professor when your not talking to him about MATH! he goes so fast its so hard to follow. If you are NOT a Math Wiz, which I am not.. deff. take a different professor. I just slid by thanks to his bonus questions and the one online test he gave us (which he said he would never do again)

Had alot of energy about the subject but just could not teach it. Moves very fast and makes many mistakes. Tries to come off acting like a "hard" teacher but just makes himself look dumb. Overall very hard to follow.

I took him for College Algebra in the summer. Most of it was really basics that are needed for Math 1190. It is true that a lot of students who take Math 1113 should take a lower class instead, and I feel that by taking Math 1111 and Math 1112 together, instead of just Math 1113, has helped me prepare for Calculus I (and beyond) more than anything.

PRACTICE! lots of bonus given. available for extra help for at least a couple hours EVERY day. tests are short-but you HAVE to know what you are doing (hence, practice). very nice guy who wants you to do well! but he wants you to work hard for that A- i did! :) and i got to exempt the final!

TAKE THIS GUY! i had him for two semesters and made A's BOTH times in ADDITION to exempting the final both times. He offers lots of extra help during his office hours and is very nice about helping you to understand things. tests are pretty short. not really alot of homework. online hw easy. attendance is basically like bonus. LOTS of extra credit

Had some health problems but still showed up everyday. Let class out early. Goes over the notes very quickly. Follows the book, and posts powerpoints online. Assigns both online and book HW. Attendance counts & does quizzes. Most of the test questions come straight from the HW. The book was not very easy to follow, so a tutor was really helpful!

Prof Garner is cool and i love his jokes! D class was a bit hard for me in the beginning b/c i didn't the HW seriously at 1st. He's very fast & tests at random but the tests are easy if u do the HW. I got a B. wld have gotten a better grade if worked harder from start. He had some health challenges but it didn't affect his classes. Class ends early

AMAZING PROFESSOR! Really knows his stuff and wants students to succeed. Tests and quizzes were fair and powerpoints were helpful. Class was enjoyable and engaging with minimal work. Always has a joke to tell and always gave 100% despite debilitating health problems. Would love to take more classes with him! TWO THUMBS UP!

I would highly recommend this class! I am terrible in math and came out with a fir grade! This class is not a lot of work, but you do have to come to class! He grades very fair. He is kind of cheesy, but its funny. He had health problems this semester so it was hard for him to teach and he still put in the effort. He wants the same effort in return
Dudes need to chill out. It IS a hard class and you WILL have to put a lot of work into it, but you are in college...so....Prof Garner is super sweet!

Most of the class is failing....he doesn't help students...he always ends class early, but you don't learn anything! I don't know what happened with those people who say he is good...anyways...it's a hard class and not a good teacher. STAY AWAY!!!

Ok, after reading these comments I have to say, He is a great teacher and person, if you listen and read pp notes you will do fine. His tests are simple and multiple choice (questions come from  hw) if you do the hw, you will do well!! I'm horrible at math and always have been, yet I have an A in the class. He is always willing to help and I would

One of the nicest profs out there. Very clear and is always available for outside help. He LOVES helping you if you dont get something. Tests are easy. And homework will take you all of about 10 minutes. Loves doing what he does and it shows. Should be an easy A if you are even remotely good at math. Highly recommend.
DO NOT TAKE HIM

Had some health issues this semester which made it hard for him to teach at his best. Overall he is a really nice guy. 3 tests, quizes are random to make sure you come to class. Not too bad considering the circumstances this semester.
Ok, So he had some health issues, but that was not our fault.  Didn't teach well enough.  Might be a good professor when he is on his top game, but not this semester.

He doesn't explain things well and this is a very hard class anyways. Don't get me wrong, he is a very nice man! And he has had some health issues this semester which also probably factored into the difficulty of the class. I feel sorry that he had to go through so much pain (and he still came to class!). However, this class will ruin my GPA.

STAY AWAY! Absolutely HORRIBLE professor. CAN NOT TEACH!! I have shed tears of frustration for this class, it is that bad. He rushes through everything and is not clear AT ALL. SAVE YOURSELF and DO NOT take this class!!

Avoid. He rushes through everything, and then lets class out early. Which would be nice, if he was clear and able explain everything. Don't bother asking question, he just repeats what he already says. If you take him, buy the ebook..

VERY fast paced, I cried every day. He knows his stuff and is willing to help but only if you have time outside of class. If you don't smoke will come out of your pencil and calc trying to keep up with him. He also lost one of my quizzes and basically said "oh well" and didnt believe me. Other than that a he's a good/fair teacher.

Prof. Garner is awesome. PowerPoints are online for use at all times. He's funny and VERY helpful. Don't by the texbook you wont use it, you just need the MyMathLab code coz you do homework through it. He takes attendance and you start dropping a grade if you go over 5 absences. Overall, I think he's awesome and you should definitely take him.
Wonderful professor! Makes a rather dull subject....quite fun and interesting.  Clancy Garner is witty, smart and fair.  Take him....you won't be disappointed!
He is a very good teacher and gives plenty of chances to come in for help. He really cares about the grades of his students, but you have to show that you want to do well. A very fair teacher.
Lame teacher.  Do not recommend taking his class
He is an great teacher and all his notes are online. All the quizzes are from the homework or notes, which you can use while taking the quiz.

Was an excellent teacher. Clear in what he teaches and asks for questions. If you come to class and pay attention his class is not a problem. He replaces your lowest test grade with 90% of final  Math XL easy 100 and good support for lectures (If you don't learn something in class XL can teach it.

he has a great personality but his class is AWFUL!! i would not advise anyone to take this class. i do the homework and i am always in class and still to horrible on the tests!! it is really hard!! there is no extra credit and there is only 4 tests then the final.

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!  Garner does not care about you, your grade, or anyone else except for himself.  He starts class about 10 minutes prior to its official start time and rushes through his lectures.  Everything I learned in this class, I had to teach myself on my own time.  WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY!!  I'm sure he won't be here for long!

Dr. Garner was a great teacher, he moves at a reasonable pace but gives plenty of examples to help.  I failed the first two exams because i didn?t study but did the math xl and did good on the rest of the tests and made a B. highly recommended.
Great Professor! Who highly recommend!

Mr. G is a good teacher and a funny guy. Mandatory attendance! He was available for help 1hr before our class to go over hw from the book - and gives pop quizzes on it, so do it! MathXL hw = easy 100. No makeup tests, even if it was something you couldn't help :( but 90% of the final will replace it. He also reads these, can I please have an A? lol

Mr.G was a great teacher, he definitely knows his stuff and if he makes a mistake he is not afraid to admit to it lol he actually gives you candy if you catch one of his mistakes. He is very informative and makes it easy to learn. I highly

If 50% of a class is not able to pass due to dropping/failing a course, it is because the professor is not relating the information in a manner that the students can comprehend. This is not even including the percentage of a class that may barely pass. Sounds like it`s time for the professor to take a new approach.

Mr. Garner is a fantastic math teacher. I've always struggled/not enjoyed math, but that was until this class. I was planning on taking the easy road through math, but i'll be taking Calculus next semester because of this class! Highly recommend if you want to *gasp*, even have fun in a math class. TAKE THIS CLASS! highly recommend.

He is a great guy!! I stuggled to make a 'C' however he is the best teacher I have ever had. He is overly helpful and goes out of his way to help. the test and quizzes are correct as the other ratings. If you like Math or hate Math, he is a great proff.  I am very disappointed he is not teaching 1106.

He was one of my favorite teachers!! I definitly recomend that you take him. You must attend class to pass. He moves a little fast with the notes but he will show the work again if you need him to. The quizzes come straight from the homework so you must do the homework.also at the begining of the class he will go over any homework problems. The tes

Out of 3 tests, I only made a B on one of them (the other two I failed) but I still managed to get a B in the class. He offers a lot of help and I highly recommend it. He is an awesome guy, just sometimes can move a little fast but all the notes are posted online and with the quizzes and Math XL homework, that can really help your grade.

This guy is an S.O.B. (Sweet ole boy). i struggled horribly on his test..never made a B and got a B in the class. His math XL is easy...13 quizzes in class (so u need to go) that were very easy. Some were just putting your name on them. Study hard for the test though.
he is so easy. i loved it

Great professor. Energetic teaching style and very open to helping students. He also knows not to take himself too seriously. He often breaks up long or boring lectures with random jokes and the like. Not an easy class though. You definitely need to pay attention to do well. My only complaint is that he sometimes explains things a bit too quickly.

Great teacher. Really enjoyed his class. Presents in clear understandable manner. Provides online printable notes and HW answers before tests. Goes over HW as much as needed. Tests come from HW and Final comes from the tests. I exempted out of the final because I had a 100 in the class.

HE IS AN AMAZING PROFESSOR I WISH HE TEACHED 1112 AS WELL.EVEN IF I'M AN INTERNATIONAL STUDENT. I WAS ABLE TO UNDERSTAND THIS COURSE EASILY THANKS TO MR GARNER'S LECTURE.HE IS SUCH AN SOB.GREAT PROFESSOR.IF YOU HAVE A CHANCE TO TAKE HIS CLASS DO NOT HESITATE.YOU'LL ENJOY IT

HE IS THE BEST!!!!! Ok, after thinking all my life that I was the most useless person in Math, and studing a career that didn't have math at all (just to avoid it) I found Mr. G.  He is clear, explains cristal clear, fair, fun and knows what he is talking about. To sad that KSU did not hired him..BIG MISTAKE. If I understood, you will to.GUARANTEED

Prof. Garner is the man! Keeps you interested and motivated. 4 tests, 13 quizzes on homework problems, and 15 online homework assignments. He is very structured and knows the material well. Also lets you use a 3x5 notecard on tests. Just an all around good professor.

Great professor!!  Super easy, will never put ridiculously "tricky" problems on the test, lets you use a cheat notecard, and everything comes from the HW in the book and online.  I would take him for every math class ever if I could!

Professor Garner is three things above all: a "sweet old boy". He will repeat that until it makes you crazy. Even though I did not perform very well in his class I would definitely recommend him to those with a strong math background. He has his own personal website, separate from WebCT which he uses to grade homework assignments due on MathXL.

I love Mr. Garner because he is the sweetest professor. His class is easy and fun with flexible attendance policy(but don't skip more than 5 classes!). There is a big chance u can get an A & skip the final if u do your homework:12 quizzes(from homework), 3 tests(u r allowed to bring a cheat sheet). You'll enjoy his class!

I love Mr. Garner because he is the sweetest professor. His class is easy&fun.Attendance is not as important(but don't skip more than 5 classes!). There is a big chance u can get an A & skip the final if u do your homework:12 quizzes(from homework), 3 tests(u r allowed to bring a cheat sheet). You'll enjoy his class!

Great teacher!!!!! Must come to class after 5 missed classes you loose a letter grade and so on. He also gives pop quizes on hw problems we went over in class. So BE there!!! He is very nice and funny. Do the homework and study and you will get an A. He also lets u have a note card for the test and lets you use calculator programs. Test are easy!!!

Whether you like math or hate it, take Clancy Garner! He's very friendly and approachable. Funny guy, and an excellent teacher. He will do everything in his power to help you pass and understand math. He keeps it interesting.

Prof. Garner is a lot of fun; he tells jokes during class, but you still learn math from him... and more! It's helpful to keep up with the homework because he gives random quizzes on it during class. He lets you use 1 notecard on exams. He's easy to approach for extra help outside of class. I highly recommend him!

I plan to take Clancy for all of my math classes, and I am 2 semesters strong! He is very simplistic; he likes things to be easy for his students. His notes are clear and he knows the material well. Tests and quizzes are a piece of cake. I recommend him.
very easy A... and it's not  a boring class... you actually would learns something in here...

Easy quizzes, easy tests. He gives the option of pre-printing the power points. He offers great help, and actually provides calculator programs to make things really easy. He let's you use whatever info you can fit on an index card for tests. I'd take him again.

wonderful, funny, and energetic. During the first class he yelled "BOO" in the middle just to ease the tension. quizes: "write the answer to #7 from your homework" - that's it! easy easy A! his test and quiz question come literally straight from the homework, and you get an index card for every test. he's an amazing man.
he was awesome! very clever and cheerful.. delightful to come to class. do the homework and tests should be easy.. he is always willing to help!
No Comments
